channel.title: I have been trying to add godwars forever...please help
channel.description: Ok, ive been coding godwars on my own, cuz i thought i could do it...i have the npcs where there suppose to be, there just one problem...I just can't get them to drop the hilts shards and all that. Yes im not a retard, ive put it in npcdrops.cfg, but idk...please help :confused: :confused:
